description: PC Daniel Fortune, 41, has been charged with causing serious injury by dangerous driving.
title: Bristol crash: Officer charged after woman seriously injured
title_page: Bristol crash: Officer charged after woman seriously injured - BBC News
maintext:
A police officer has been charged with dangerous driving after a woman was seriously injured in a crash.
Avon and Somerset Police's PC Daniel Fortune, 41, was on Bristol's A4 Portway, driving to a incident, when the Volvo XC90 passed through a red light and collided with a car being driven by a member of the public.
The woman driver sustained serious injuries and the passenger in the Volvo was also injured.
PC Fortune will appear at Cheltenham Magistrates Court on Thursday.
